abstract: Amazon, the leading online retailer, is acquiring an online shoe retailer that is famous for its obsession with customer service.
snippet: Amazon, the leading online retailer, is acquiring an online shoe retailer that is famous for its obsession with customer service.
lead_paragraph: Update | 7:04 p.m.  A more detailed version of this story has been posted here.

headline.main: Amazon to Acquire Zappos for $847 Million
